english.segment1: vs1. she just wanted someone to fight. it helped to make her feel alive. someone to hit, someone to love. who couldnt exist so high above
english.segment2: ch. she is waiting for the day. when he comes to her to say. that he is not a voice in her head. hes raising up the dead
english.segment3: vs2. shell drive her car into the lake. hoping she might see his face. if hes everywhere, then why not here. why navigate, why even steer
english.segment5: bridge. alone under the stars. shes walking off the night. when you dont know where you are. following the light is not a choice
english.segment6: ch. she is waiting for the day. when he comes to her to say. that he is not a voice in her head. hes not the father who fled. hes not the things that they said. hes raising up the dead
